title: Suggestions on good dealers for T206 PSA 4/5 commons
author: becollie

posts.post_title: Suggestions on good dealers for T206 PSA 4/5 commons
posts.post_content:
Been stuck on my last 150 cards for some time.  I've got all my searches set up on ebay but hits are slowing quite a bit.  

Any good dealers folks can suggest?  Or please PM me directly and I can send my list.

Determined to get the monster finished this year.

Thanks,

Brian

[url]collie.brian@bcg.com[/url]
PMing you. Bill B, also a member here. He is a great resource for t206

[quote name="Rhotchkiss" post=2197533]PMing you. Bill B, also a member here. He is a great resource for t206[/QUOTE]

Seconded on Bill B
On a side note-I agree with it being a little slow on eBay or $$$.

I agree on reaching out to Bill B…


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Awesome.  I used to buy a ton from Bill back in the day on eBay.  Look forward to reconnecting with him.  Thanks for the quick replies.
